channel.title: Help on a few things
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how i would change the spawning point when i die??
also how would i change the menu interface from:
[IMG]http://i106.photobucket.com/albums/m261/inthemajors/title.jpg[/img]
To this:
[IMG]http://i106.photobucket.com/albums/m261/inthemajors/title1.jpg[/img]
Any and all help would be appreciated.
Ty

item.title: Help on a few things
item.dc:creator: @Dennis Dennis
item.description:
@Dennis wrote:

I already have that menu interface just i think this one is overlapping it some how

Read full topic

item.title: Help on a few things
item.dc:creator: @_Kaos [Kaos]
item.description:
@_Kaos wrote:

First youll have to find your death void. Servers are different but try looking for applydead() or dietele() something similar.

Second youll need to find your menu void, and then change it to this,

[code] public void MyMenu()
{

				sendQuest("", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("", 8145);//Line 1
				sendQuest("", 8147);//Line 2
				sendQuest("", 8148);//Line 3
			        sendQuest("", 8149);//Line 4
                                    sendQuest("", 8150);//Line 5
			        sendQuest("", 8151);//Line 6
			        sendQuest("", 8152);//Line 7
			        sendQuest("", 8153);//Line 8
			       	sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();

			}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help on a few things
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

get the coords from where u die and seatch in client.java(before or after you will see the word “dead”(i think is it))

Read full topic
